data.title: Pokémon Go’s new snapshot mode will let you take better AR-powered pics
data.meta_description: Niantic announces Go Snapshot, a new AR photo feature for Pokémon Go that will let you take pictures of your Pokémon anytime, anywhere and at the right scale. Go Snapshot is coming to Pokémon Go on Android and iOS “soon.”
data.text: Select a Pokémon and tap on the screen to throw its Poké Ball to that spot. Once your Pokémon is situated in the ideal spot, you can then move around it to find the best angle for your photo. Is your Pokémon distracted or looking the wrong way? Brush across it to get its attention, and it will be sure to face you.
